rows.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
rows.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
rows.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

rows.arabic: الٓر ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
rows.translation: Alif Lam Ra. These are the verses of the wise Book.
rows.transliteration: alif lām rā ۚ tilka āyātul kitābil ḥakīm

rows.arabic: أَكَانَ لِلنَّاسِ عَجَبًا أَنْ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ رَجُلٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَنْ أَنذِرِ ٱلنَّاسَ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنَّ لَهُمْ قَدَمَ صِدْقٍ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۗ قَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ مُّبِينٌ
rows.translation: What! is it a wonder to the people that We revealed to a man from among themselves, saying: Warn the people and give good news to those who believe that theirs is a footing of firmness with their Lord. The unbelievers say: This is most surely a manifest enchanter.
rows.transliteration: akāna linnāsi `ajaban an awḥaynā ilā rajulin minhum an andhirin nāsa wabashhiril ladhīna āmanū anna lahum qadama ṣidqin `inda rabbihim ۗ qālal-kāfirūna inna hādhā lasāḥirun mubīn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۖ يُدَبِّرُ ٱلْأَمْرَ ۖ مَا مِن شَفِيعٍ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ إِذْنِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ ۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
rows.translation: Surely your Lord is Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth in six periods, and He is firm in power, regulating the affair, there is no intercessor except after His permission; this is Allah, your Lord, therefore serve Him; will you not then mind?
rows.transliteration: inna rabbakumullāhul ladhī khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa fī sittati ayyāmin thummas-tawā `alal-`arsh ۖ yudabbirul-amr ۖ mā min shafī`in illā min ba`di idhnih ۚ dhālikumullāhu rabbukum fa`budūh ۚ afalā tadhakkarūn

rows.arabic: إِلَيْهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ جَمِيعًا ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّا ۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَبْدَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ لِيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَهُمْ شَرَابٌ مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ وَعَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْفُرُونَ
rows.translation: To Him is your return, of all (of you); the promise of Allah (made) in truth; surely He begins the creation in the first instance, then He reproduces it, that He may with justice recompense those who believe and do good; and (as for) those who disbelieve, they shall have a drink of hot water and painful punishment because they disbelieved.
rows.transliteration: ilayhi marji`ukum jamī`ā ۖ wa`dallāhi ḥaqqā ۚ innahu yabda-ul khalqa thumma yu`īduhu liyajziyal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti bil qisṭ ۚ wal ladhīna kafarū lahum sharābun min ḥamīmin wa`adhābun alīmun bimā kānū yakfurūn

rows.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ ضِيَآءً وَٱلْقَمَرَ نُورًا وَقَدَّرَهُۥ مَنَازِلَ لِتَعْلَمُوا۟ عَدَدَ ٱلسِّنِينَ وَٱلْحِسَابَ ۚ مَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ذَٰلِكَ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ يُفَصِّلُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: He it is Who made the sun a shining brightness and the moon a light, and ordained for it mansions that you might know the computation of years and the reckoning. Allah did not create it but with truth; He makes the signs manifest for a people who know.
rows.transliteration: huwal ladhī ja`alash shamsa ḍiyā-an wal qamara nūran waqaddarahu manāzila lita`lamū `adadas sinīna wal ḥisāb ۚ mā khalaqallāhu dhālika illā bil ḥaqq ۚ yufaṣṣilul-āyāti liqawmiy ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ٱخْتِلَـٰفِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَتَّقُونَ
rows.translation: Most surely in the variation of the night and the day, and what Allah has created in the heavens and the earth, there are signs for a people who guard (against evil).
rows.transliteration: inna fikh-tilāfil layli wan nahāri wa mā khalaqallāhu fis samāwāti wal-arḍi la-āyātin liqawmiy yattaqūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا وَرَضُوا۟ بِٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱطْمَأَنُّوا۟ بِهَا وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا غَـٰفِلُونَ
rows.translation: Surely those who do not hope in Our meeting and are pleased with this world's life and are content with it, and those who are heedless of Our communications:
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna lā yarjūna liqā-anā waraḍū bil ḥayātid dunyā waṭma-annū bihā wal ladhīna hum `an āyātinā ghāfilūn

rows.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ مَأْوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
rows.translation: (As for) those, their abode is the fire because of what they earned.
rows.transliteration: ulā-ika ma-wāhumun nāru bimā kānū yaksibūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ يَهْدِيهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِإِيمَـٰنِهِمْ ۖ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهِمُ ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ فِى جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
rows.translation: Surely (as for) those who believe and do good, their Lord will guide them by their faith; there shall flow from beneath them rivers in gardens of bliss.
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti yahdīhim rabbuhum bi-iymānihim ۖ tajrī min taḥtihimul-anhāru fī jannātin na`īm

rows.arabic: دَعْوَىٰهُمْ فِيهَا سُبْحَـٰنَكَ ٱللَّهُمَّ وَتَحِيَّتُهُمْ فِيهَا سَلَـٰمٌ ۚ وَءَاخِرُ دَعْوَىٰهُمْ أَنِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
rows.translation: Their cry in it shall be: Glory to Thee, O Allah! and their greeting in it shall be: Peace; and the last of their cry shall be: Praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
rows.transliteration: da`wāhum fīhā subḥānakallāhumma wataḥiyyatuhum fīhā salām ۚ wa-ākhiru da`wāhum anil ḥamdu lillāhi rabbil `ālamīn

rows.arabic: وَلَوْ يُعَجِّلُ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ ٱلشَّرَّ ٱسْتِعْجَالَهُم بِٱلْخَيْرِ لَقُضِىَ إِلَيْهِمْ أَجَلُهُمْ ۖ فَنَذَرُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
rows.translation: And if Allah should hasten the evil to men as they desire the hastening on of good, their doom should certainly have been decreed for them; but We leave those alone who hope not for Our meeting in their inordinacy, blindly wandering on.
rows.transliteration: walaw yu`ajjilullāhu linnāsish sharras-ti`jālahum bil khayri laquḍiya ilayhim ajaluhum ۖ fanadharul ladhīna lā yarjūna liqā-anā fī ṭughyānihim ya`mahūn

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ٱلضُّرُّ دَعَانَا لِجَنۢبِهِۦٓ أَوْ قَاعِدًا أَوْ قَآئِمًا فَلَمَّا كَشَفْنَا عَنْهُ ضُرَّهُۥ مَرَّ كَأَن لَّمْ يَدْعُنَآ إِلَىٰ ضُرٍّ مَّسَّهُۥ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: And when affliction touches a man, he calls on Us, whether lying on his side or sitting or standing; but when We remove his affliction from him, he passes on as though he had never called on Us on account of an affliction that touched him; thus that which they do is made fair-seeming to the extravagant.
rows.transliteration: wa idhā massal-insānaḍ ḍurru da`ānā lijanbihi aw qā`idan aw qā-iman falammā kashafnā `anhu ḍurrahu marra ka-an lam yad`unā ilā ḍurrin massah ۚ kadhālika zuyyina lil-musrifīna mā kānū ya`malūn

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَا ٱلْقُرُونَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ لَمَّا ظَلَمُوا۟ ۙ وَجَآءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ لِيُؤْمِنُوا۟ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
rows.translation: And certainly We did destroy generations before you when they were unjust, and their apostles had come to them with clear arguments, and they would not believe; thus do We recompense the guilty people.
rows.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknal qurūna min qablikum lammā ẓalamū wajā-at hum rusuluhum bil bayyināti wa mā kānū liyu-minū ۚ kadhālika najzil qawmal mujrimīn

rows.arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَـٰكُمْ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ لِنَنظُرَ كَيْفَ تَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: Then We made you successors in the land after them so that We may see how you act.
rows.transliteration: thumma ja`alnākum khalā-ifa fil-arḍi min ba`dihim linanẓura kayfa ta`malūn

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَاتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍ ۙ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا ٱئْتِ بِقُرْءَانٍ غَيْرِ هَـٰذَآ أَوْ بَدِّلْهُ ۚ قُلْ مَا يَكُونُ لِىٓ أَنْ أُبَدِّلَهُۥ مِن تِلْقَآئِ نَفْسِىٓ ۖ إِنْ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ ۖ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
rows.translation: And when Our clear communications are recited to them, those who hope not for Our meeting say: Bring a Quran other than this or change it. Say: It does not beseem me that I should change it of myself; I follow naught but what is revealed to me; surely I fear, if I disobey my Lord, the punishment of a mighty day.
rows.transliteration: wa idhā tutlā `alayhim āyātunā bayyinātin qālal ladhīna lā yarjūna liqā-ana-ti biqur-ānin ghayri hādhā aw baddilh ۚ qul mā yakūnu lī an ubaddilahu min tilqā-i nafsī ۖ in attabi`u illā mā yūḥā ilayy ۖ innī akhāfu in `aṣaytu rabbī `adhāba yawmin `aẓīm

rows.arabic: قُل لَّوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَا تَلَوْتُهُۥ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَآ أَدْرَىٰكُم بِهِۦ ۖ فَقَدْ لَبِثْتُ فِيكُمْ عُمُرًا مِّن قَبْلِهِۦٓ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
rows.translation: Say: If Allah had desired (otherwise) I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have taught it to you; indeed I have lived a lifetime among you before it; do you not then understand?
rows.transliteration: qul law shā-allāhu mā talawtuhu `alaykum walā adrākum bih ۖ faqad labithtu fīkum `umuran min qablih ۚ afalā ta`qilūn

rows.arabic: فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوْ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
rows.translation: Who is then more unjust than who forges a lie against Allah or (who) gives the lie to His communications? Surely the guilty shall not be successful.
rows.transliteration: faman aẓlamu mimmanif-tarā `alallāhi kadhiban aw kadhhaba bi-āyātih ۚ innahu lā yufliḥul mujrimūn

rows.arabic: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُمْ وَلَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَيَقُولُونَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ شُفَعَـٰٓؤُنَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَتُنَبِّـُٔونَ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا لَا يَعْلَمُ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
rows.translation: And they serve beside Allah what can neither harm them nor profit them, and they say: These are our intercessors with Allah. Say: Do you (presume to) inform Allah of what He knows not in the heavens and the earth? Glory be to Him, and supremely exalted is He above what they set up (with Him).
rows.transliteration: waya`budūna min dūnillāhi mā lā yaḍurruhum walā yanfa`uhum wayaqūlūna hā-ulā-i shufa`ā-unā `indallāh ۚ qul atunabbi-ūnallāha bimā lā ya`lamu fis samāwāti walā fil-arḍ ۚ subḥānahu wata`ālā `ammā yushrikūn

rows.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱلنَّاسُ إِلَّآ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً فَٱخْتَلَفُوا۟ ۚ وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَتْ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُمْ فِيمَا فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
rows.translation: And people are naught but a single nation, so they disagree; and had not a word already gone forth from your Lord, the matter would have certainly been decided between them in respect of that concerning which they disagree.
rows.transliteration: wa mā kānan nāsu illā ummatan wāḥidatan fakhtalafū ۚ walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laquḍiya baynahum fīmā fīhi yakhtalifūn

rows.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۖ فَقُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْغَيْبُ لِلَّهِ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓا۟ إِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُنتَظِرِينَ
rows.translation: And they say: Why is not a sign sent to him from his Lord? Say: The unseen is only for Allah; therefore wait-- surely I too, with you am of those who wait.
rows.transliteration: wayaqūlūna lawlā unzila `alayhi āyatun min rabbih ۖ faqul innamal ghaybu lillāhi fantaẓirū innī ma`akum minal muntaẓirīn

rows.arabic: وَإِذَآ أَذَقْنَا ٱلنَّاسَ رَحْمَةً مِّنۢ بَعْدِ ضَرَّآءَ مَسَّتْهُمْ إِذَا لَهُم مَّكْرٌ فِىٓ ءَايَاتِنَا ۚ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَسْرَعُ مَكْرًا ۚ إِنَّ رُسُلَنَا يَكْتُبُونَ مَا تَمْكُرُونَ
rows.translation: And when We make people taste of mercy after an affliction touches them, lo! they devise plans against Our communication. Say: Allah is quicker to plan; surely Our apostles write down what you plan.
rows.transliteration: wa idhā adhaqnan nāsa raḥmatan min ba`di ḍarrā-a massat-hum idhā lahum makrun fī āyātinā ۚ qulillāhu asra`u makrā ۚ inna rusulanā yaktubūna mā tamkurūn

rows.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُسَيِّرُكُمْ فِى ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا كُنتُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ وَجَرَيْنَ بِهِم بِرِيحٍ طَيِّبَةٍ وَفَرِحُوا۟ بِهَا جَآءَتْهَا رِيحٌ عَاصِفٌ وَجَآءَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْجُ مِن كُلِّ مَكَانٍ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ أُحِيطَ بِهِمْ ۙ دَعَوُا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ لَئِنْ أَنجَيْتَنَا مِنْ هَـٰذِهِۦ لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
rows.translation: He it is Who makes you travel by land and sea; until when you are in the ships, and they sail on with them in a pleasant breeze, and they rejoice, a violent wind overtakes them and the billows surge in on them from all sides, and they become certain that they are encompassed about, they pray to Allah, being sincere to Him in obedience: If Thou dost deliver us from this, we will most certainly be of the grateful ones.
rows.transliteration: huwal ladhī yusayyirukum fil barri wal baḥr ۖ ḥattā idhā kuntum fil fulki wajarayna bihim birīḥin ṭayyibatin wafariḥū bihā jā-at hā rīḥun `āṣifun wajā-ahumul mawju min kulli makānin waẓannū annahum uḥīṭa bihim da`awullāha mukhliṣīna lahud dīna la-in anjaytanā min hādhihi lanakūnanna minash shākirīn

rows.arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَنجَىٰهُمْ إِذَا هُمْ يَبْغُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ بِغَيْرِ ٱلْحَقِّ ۗ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَا بَغْيُكُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُم ۖ مَّتَـٰعَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْنَا مَرْجِعُكُمْ فَنُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: But when He delivers them, lo! they are unjustly rebellious in the earth. O men! your rebellion is against your own souls-- provision (only) of this world's life-- then to Us shall be your return, so We will inform you of what you did.
rows.transliteration: falammā anjāhum idhā hum yabghūna fil-arḍi bighayril ḥaqq ۗ yā-ayyuhan nāsu innamā baghyukum `alā anfusikum ۖ matā`al ḥayātid dunyā ۖ thumma ilaynā marji`ukum fanunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum ta`malūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّمَا مَثَلُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخْتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلْأَرْضِ مِمَّا يَأْكُلُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمُ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زُخْرُفَهَا وَٱزَّيَّنَتْ وَظَنَّ أَهْلُهَآ أَنَّهُمْ قَـٰدِرُونَ عَلَيْهَآ أَتَىٰهَآ أَمْرُنَا لَيْلًا أَوْ نَهَارًا فَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا حَصِيدًا كَأَن لَّمْ تَغْنَ بِٱلْأَمْسِ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
rows.translation: The likeness of this world's life is only as water which We send down from the cloud, then the herbage of the earth of which men and cattle eat grows luxuriantly thereby, until when the earth puts on its golden raiment and it becomes garnished, and its people think that they have power over it, Our command comes to it, by night or by day, so We render it as reaped seed; produce, as though it had not been in existence yesterday; thus do We make clear the communications for a people who reflect.
rows.transliteration: innamā mathalul ḥayātid dunyā kamā-in anzalnāhu minas samā-i fakhtalaṭa bihi nabātul-arḍi mimmā ya-kulun nāsu wal-an`āmu ḥattā idhā akhadhatil-arḍu zukhrufahā wazzayyanat waẓanna ahluhā annahum qādirūna `alayhā atāhā amrunā laylan aw nahāran faja`alnāhā ḥaṣīdan ka-an lam taghna bil-ams ۚ kadhālika nufaṣṣilul-āyāti liqawmiy yatafakkarūn

rows.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ دَارِ ٱلسَّلَـٰمِ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
rows.translation: And Allah invites to the abode of peace and guides whom He pleases into the right path.
rows.transliteration: wallāhu yad`ū ilā dāris salāmi wayahdī man yashā-u ilā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm

rows.arabic: لِّلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ وَزِيَادَةٌ ۖ وَلَا يَرْهَقُ وُجُوهَهُمْ قَتَرٌ وَلَا ذِلَّةٌ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
rows.translation: For those who do good is good (reward) and more (than this); and blackness or ignominy shall not cover their faces; these are the dwellers of the garden; in it they shall abide.
rows.transliteration: lilladhīna aḥsanul ḥusnā waziyādah ۖ walā yarhaqu wujūhahum qatarun walā dhillah ۚ ulā-ika aṣ-ḥābul jannah ۖ hum fīhā khālidūn

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَسَبُوا۟ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ جَزَآءُ سَيِّئَةٍۭ بِمِثْلِهَا وَتَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۖ مَّا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِنْ عَاصِمٍ ۖ كَأَنَّمَآ أُغْشِيَتْ وُجُوهُهُمْ قِطَعًا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ مُظْلِمًا ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
rows.translation: And (as for) those who have earned evil, the punishment of an evil is the like of it, and abasement shall come upon them-- they shall have none to protect them from Allah-- as if their faces had been covered with slices of the dense darkness of night; these are the inmates of the fire; in it they shall abide.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna kasabus sayyi-āti jazā-u sayyi-atin bimithlihā watarhaquhum dhillah ۖ mā lahum minallāhi min `āṣim ۖ ka-annamā ughshiyat wujūhuhum qiṭa`an minal layli muẓlimā ۚ ulā-ika aṣ-ḥābun nār ۖ hum fīhā khālidūn

rows.arabic: وَيَوْمَ نَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ نَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوا۟ مَكَانَكُمْ أَنتُمْ وَشُرَكَآؤُكُمْ ۚ فَزَيَّلْنَا بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ شُرَكَآؤُهُم مَّا كُنتُمْ إِيَّانَا تَعْبُدُونَ
rows.translation: And on the day when We will gather them all together, then We will say to those who associated others (with Allah): Keep where you are, you and your associates; then We shall separate them widely one from another and their associates would say: It was not us that you served:
rows.transliteration: wayawma naḥshuruhum jamī`an thumma naqūlu lilladhīna ashrakū makānakum antum washurakā-ukum ۚ fazayyalnā baynahum ۖ waqāla shurakā-uhum mā kuntum iyyānā ta`budūn

rows.arabic: فَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًۢا بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكُمْ إِن كُنَّا عَنْ عِبَادَتِكُمْ لَغَـٰفِلِينَ
rows.translation: Therefore Allah is sufficient as a witness between us and you that we were quite unaware of your serving (us).
rows.transliteration: fakafā billāhi shahīdan baynanā wabaynakum in kunnā `an `ibādatikum laghāfilīn

rows.arabic: هُنَالِكَ تَبْلُوا۟ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّآ أَسْلَفَتْ ۚ وَرُدُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوْلَىٰهُمُ ٱلْحَقِّ ۖ وَضَلَّ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
rows.translation: There shall every soul become acquainted with what it sent before, and they shall be brought back to Allah, their true Patron, and what they devised shall escape from them.
rows.transliteration: hunālika tablū kullu nafsin mā aslafat ۚ waruddū ilallāhi mawlāhumul ḥaqq ۖ waḍalla `anhum mā kānū yaftarūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ مَن يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ أَمَّن يَمْلِكُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَمَن يُخْرِجُ ٱلْحَىَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَيِّتِ وَيُخْرِجُ ٱلْمَيِّتَ مِنَ ٱلْحَىِّ وَمَن يُدَبِّرُ ٱلْأَمْرَ ۚ فَسَيَقُولُونَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ فَقُلْ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
rows.translation: Say: Who gives you sustenance from the heaven and the earth? Or Who controls the hearing and the sight? And Who brings forth the living from the dead, and brings forth the dead from the living? And Who regulates the affairs? Then they will say: Allah. Say then: Will you not then guard (against evil)?
rows.transliteration: qul man yarzuqukum minas samā-i wal-arḍi amman yamlikus sam`a wal-abṣāra wa man yukhrijul ḥayya minal mayyiti wayukhrijul mayyita minal ḥayyi wa man yudabbirul-amr ۚ fasayaqūlūnallāh ۚ faqul afalā tattaqūn

rows.arabic: فَذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَاذَا بَعْدَ ٱلْحَقِّ إِلَّا ٱلضَّلَـٰلُ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ
rows.translation: This then is Allah, your true Lord; and what is there after the truth but error; how are you then turned back?
rows.transliteration: fadhālikumullāhu rabbukumul ḥaqq ۖ famādhā ba`dal ḥaqqi illaḍ ḍalāl ۖ fa-annā tuṣrafūn

rows.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ فَسَقُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: Thus does the word of your Lord prove true against those who transgress that they do not believe.
rows.transliteration: kadhālika ḥaqqat kalimatu rabbika `alal ladhīna fasaqū annahum lā yu-minūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ هَلْ مِن شُرَكَآئِكُم مَّن يَبْدَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ ۚ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يَبْدَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤْفَكُونَ
rows.translation: Say: Is there any one among your associates who can bring into existence the creation in the first instance, then reproduce it? Say: Allah brings the creation into existence, then He reproduces it; how are you then turned away?
rows.transliteration: qul hal min shurakā-ikum man yabda-ul khalqa thumma yu`īduh ۚ qulillāhu yabda-ul khalqa thumma yu`īduh ۖ fa-annā tu-fakūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ هَلْ مِن شُرَكَآئِكُم مَّن يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلْحَقِّ ۚ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يَهْدِى لِلْحَقِّ ۗ أَفَمَن يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلْحَقِّ أَحَقُّ أَن يُتَّبَعَ أَمَّن لَّا يَهِدِّىٓ إِلَّآ أَن يُهْدَىٰ ۖ فَمَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
rows.translation: Say: Is there any of your associates who guides to the truth? Say: Allah guides to the truth. Is He then Who guides to the truth more worthy to be followed, or he who himself does not go aright unless he is guided? What then is the matter with you; how do you judge?
rows.transliteration: qul hal min shurakā-ikum man yahdī ilal-ḥaqq ۚ qulillāhu yahdī lilḥaqq ۗ afaman yahdī ilal-ḥaqqi aḥaqqu an yuttaba`a amman lā yahiddī illā an yuhdā ۖ famā lakum kayfa taḥkumūn

rows.arabic: وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ أَكْثَرُهُمْ إِلَّا ظَنًّا ۚ إِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ شَيْـًٔا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌۢ بِمَا يَفْعَلُونَ
rows.translation: And most of them do not follow (anything) but conjecture; surely conjecture will not avail aught against the truth; surely Allah is cognizant of what they do.
rows.transliteration: wa mā yattabi`u aktharuhum illā ẓannā ۚ innaẓ ẓanna lā yughnī minal ḥaqqi shay-ā ۚ innallāha `alīmun bimā yaf`alūn

rows.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانُ أَن يُفْتَرَىٰ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَـٰكِن تَصْدِيقَ ٱلَّذِى بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ وَتَفْصِيلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
rows.translation: And this Quran is not such as could be forged by those besides Allah, but it is a verification of that which is before it and a clear explanation of the book, there is no doubt in it, from the Lord of the worlds.
rows.transliteration: wa mā kāna hādhal qur-ānu an yuftarā min dūnillāhi walākin taṣdīqal ladhī bayna yadayhi watafṣīlal-kitābi lā rayba fīhi min rabbil `ālamīn

rows.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ ۖ قُلْ فَأْتُوا۟ بِسُورَةٍ مِّثْلِهِۦ وَٱدْعُوا۟ مَنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
rows.translation: Or do they say: He has forged it? Say: Then bring a chapter like this and invite whom you can besides Allah, if you are truthful.
rows.transliteration: am yaqūlūnaf-tarāh ۖ qul fa-tū bisūratim mithlihi wad`ū manis-taṭa`tum min dūnillāhi in kuntum ṣādiqīn

rows.arabic: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِمَا لَمْ يُحِيطُوا۟ بِعِلْمِهِۦ وَلَمَّا يَأْتِهِمْ تَأْوِيلُهُۥ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۖ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
rows.translation: Nay, they reject that of which they have no comprehensive knowledge, and the final sequel of it has not yet come to them; even thus did those before them reject (the truth); see then what was the end of the unjust.
rows.transliteration: bal kadhhabū bimā lam yuḥīṭū bi`il-mihi walammā ya-tihim ta-wīluh ۚ kadhālika kadhhabal ladhīna min qablihim ۖ fanẓur kayfa kāna `āqibatuẓ ẓālimīn

rows.arabic: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يُؤْمِنُ بِهِۦ وَمِنْهُم مَّن لَّا يُؤْمِنُ بِهِۦ ۚ وَرَبُّكَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
rows.translation: And of them is he who believes in it, and of them is he who does not believe in it, and your Lord best knows the mischief-makers.
rows.transliteration: wa minhum man yu-minu bihi wa minhum man lā yu-minu bih ۚ warabbuka a`lamu bil mufsidīn

rows.arabic: وَإِن كَذَّبُوكَ فَقُل لِّى عَمَلِى وَلَكُمْ عَمَلُكُمْ ۖ أَنتُم بَرِيٓـُٔونَ مِمَّآ أَعْمَلُ وَأَنَا۠ بَرِىٓءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: And if they call you a liar, say: My work is for me and your work for you; you are clear of what I do and I am clear of what you do.
rows.transliteration: wa in kadhhabūka faqul lī `amalī walakum `amalukum ۖ antum barī-ūna mimmā a`malu wa-ana barī-un mimmā ta`malūn

rows.arabic: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَسْتَمِعُونَ إِلَيْكَ ۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُسْمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ وَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
rows.translation: And there are those of them who hear you, but can you make the deaf to hear though they will not understand?
rows.transliteration: wa minhum man yastami`ūna ilayk ۚ afa-anta tusmi`uṣ ṣumma walaw kānū lā ya`qilūn

rows.arabic: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَنظُرُ إِلَيْكَ ۚ أَفَأَنتَ تَهْدِى ٱلْعُمْىَ وَلَوْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
rows.translation: And there are those of them who look at you, but can you show the way to the blind though they will not see?
rows.transliteration: wa minhum man yanẓuru ilayk ۚ afa-anta tahdil `umya walaw kānū lā yubṣirūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَظْلِمُ ٱلنَّاسَ شَيْـًٔا وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ
rows.translation: Surely Allah does not do any injustice to men, but men are unjust to themselves.
rows.transliteration: innallāha lā yaẓlimun nāsa shay-an walākinnan nāsa anfusahum yaẓlimūn

rows.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ كَأَن لَّمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا سَاعَةً مِّنَ ٱلنَّهَارِ يَتَعَارَفُونَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ قَدْ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُهْتَدِينَ
rows.translation: And on the day when He will gather them as though they had not stayed but an hour of the day, they will know each other. They will perish indeed who called the meeting with Allah to be a lie, and they are not followers of the right direction.
rows.transliteration: wayawma yaḥshuruhum ka-an lam yalbathū illā sā`atan minan nahāri yata`ārafūna baynahum ۚ qad khasiral ladhīna kadhhabū biliqā-illāhi wa mā kānū muhtadīn

rows.arabic: وَإِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعْضَ ٱلَّذِى نَعِدُهُمْ أَوْ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَيْنَا مَرْجِعُهُمْ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ
rows.translation: And if We show you something of what We threaten them with, or cause you to die, yet to Us is their return, and Allah is the bearer of witness to what they do.
rows.transliteration: wa immā nuriyannaka ba`ḍal ladhī na`iduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilaynā marji`uhum thummallāhu shahīdun `alā mā yaf`alūn

rows.arabic: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ رَّسُولٌ ۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ رَسُولُهُمْ قُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْقِسْطِ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: And every nation had an apostle; so when their apostle came, the matter was decided between them with justice and they shall not be dealt with unjustly.
rows.transliteration: walikulli ummatin rasūl ۖ fa-idhā jā-a rasūluhum quḍiya baynahum bil qisṭi wahum lā yuẓlamūn

rows.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
rows.translation: And they say: When will this threat come about, if you are truthful?
rows.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhal wa`du in kuntum ṣādiqīn

rows.arabic: قُل لَّآ أَمْلِكُ لِنَفْسِى ضَرًّا وَلَا نَفْعًا إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۗ لِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٌ ۚ إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمْ فَلَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ سَاعَةً ۖ وَلَا يَسْتَقْدِمُونَ
rows.translation: Say: I do not control for myself any harm, or any benefit except what Allah pleases; every nation has a term; when their term comes, they shall not then remain behind for an hour, nor can they go before (their time).
rows.transliteration: qul lā amliku linafsī ḍarran walā naf`an illā mā shā-allāh ۗ likulli ummatin ajal ۚ idhā jā-a ajaluhum falā yasta-khirūna sā`ah ۖ walā yastaqdimūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَتَىٰكُمْ عَذَابُهُۥ بَيَـٰتًا أَوْ نَهَارًا مَّاذَا يَسْتَعْجِلُ مِنْهُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
rows.translation: Say: Tell me if His punishment overtakes you by night or by day! what then is there of it that the guilty would hasten on?
rows.transliteration: qul ara aytum in atākum `adhābuhu bayātan aw nahāran mādhā yasta`jilu minhul mujrimūn

rows.arabic: أَثُمَّ إِذَا مَا وَقَعَ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦٓ ۚ ءَآلْـَٔـٰنَ وَقَدْ كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
rows.translation: And when it comes to pass, will you believe in it? What! now (you believe), and already you wished to have it hastened on.
rows.transliteration: athumma idhā mā waqa`a āmantum bih ۚ āl-āna waqad kuntum bihi tasta`jilūn

rows.arabic: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلْخُلْدِ هَلْ تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ
rows.translation: Then it shall be said to those who were unjust: Taste abiding chastisement; you are not requited except for what you earned.
rows.transliteration: thumma qīla lilladhīna ẓalamū dhūqū `adhābal khuldi hal tujzawna illā bimā kuntum taksibūn

rows.arabic: وَيَسْتَنۢبِـُٔونَكَ أَحَقٌّ هُوَ ۖ قُلْ إِى وَرَبِّىٓ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ
rows.translation: And they ask you: Is that true? Say: Aye! by my Lord! it is most surely the truth, and you will not escape.
rows.transliteration: wayastanbi-ūnaka aḥaqqun huw ۖ qul iy warabbī innahu laḥaqq ۖ wa mā antum bimu`jizīn

rows.arabic: وَلَوْ أَنَّ لِكُلِّ نَفْسٍ ظَلَمَتْ مَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ لَٱفْتَدَتْ بِهِۦ ۗ وَأَسَرُّوا۟ ٱلنَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ۖ وَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُم بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۚ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: And if every soul that has done injustice had all that is in the earth, it would offer it for ransom, and they will manifest regret when they see the chastisement and the matter shall be decided between them with justice and they shall not be dealt with unjustly.
rows.transliteration: walaw anna likulli nafsin ẓalamat mā fil-arḍi laftadat bih ۗ wa-asarrun nadāmata lammā ra-awul `adhāb ۖ waquḍiya baynahum bil qisṭ ۚ wahum lā yuẓlamūn

rows.arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقٌّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: Now surely Allah's is what is in the heavens and the earth; now surely Allah's promise is true, but most of them do not know.
rows.transliteration: alā inna lillāhi mā fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۗ alā inna wa`dallāhi ḥaqqun walākinna aktharahum lā ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: هُوَ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
rows.translation: He gives life and causes death, and to Him you shall be brought back.
rows.transliteration: huwa yuḥyī wayumītu wa ilayhi turja`ūn

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدْ جَآءَتْكُم مَّوْعِظَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَشِفَآءٌ لِّمَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
rows.translation: O men! there has come to you indeed an admonition from your Lord and a healing for what is in the breasts and a guidance and a mercy for the believers.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nāsu qad jā-at kum maw`iẓatun min rabbikum washifā-un limā fiṣ ṣudūri wahudan waraḥmatun lil-mu-minīn

rows.arabic: قُلْ بِفَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ وَبِرَحْمَتِهِۦ فَبِذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَفْرَحُوا۟ هُوَ خَيْرٌ مِّمَّا يَجْمَعُونَ
rows.translation: Say: In the grace of Allah and in His mercy-- in that they should rejoice; it is better than that which they gather.
rows.transliteration: qul bifaḍlillāhi wabiraḥmatihi fabidhālika falyafraḥū huwa khayrun mimmā yajma`ūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ فَجَعَلْتُم مِّنْهُ حَرَامًا وَحَلَـٰلًا قُلْ ءَآللَّهُ أَذِنَ لَكُمْ ۖ أَمْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَفْتَرُونَ
rows.translation: Say: Tell me what Allah has sent down for you of sustenance, then you make (a part) of it unlawful and (a part) lawful. Say: Has Allah commanded you, or do you forge a lie against Allah?
rows.transliteration: qul ara aytum mā anzalallāhu lakum min rizqin faja`altum minhu ḥarāman waḥalālan qul ālllāhu adhina lakum ۖ am `alallāhi taftarūn

rows.arabic: وَمَا ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفْتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْكَذِبَ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَشْكُرُونَ
rows.translation: And what will be the thought of those who forge lies against Allah on the day of resurrection? Most surely Allah is the Lord of grace towards men, but most of them do not give thanks.
rows.transliteration: wa mā ẓannul ladhīna yaftarūna `alallāhil kadhiba yawmal qiyāmah ۗ innallāha ladhū faḍlin `alan nāsi walākinna aktharahum lā yashkurūn

rows.arabic: وَمَا تَكُونُ فِى شَأْنٍ وَمَا تَتْلُوا۟ مِنْهُ مِن قُرْءَانٍ وَلَا تَعْمَلُونَ مِنْ عَمَلٍ إِلَّا كُنَّا عَلَيْكُمْ شُهُودًا إِذْ تُفِيضُونَ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَا يَعْزُبُ عَن رَّبِّكَ مِن مِّثْقَالِ ذَرَّةٍ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَلَآ أَصْغَرَ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكْبَرَ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ مُّبِينٍ
rows.translation: And you are not (engaged) in any affair, nor do you recite concerning it any portion of the Quran, nor do you do any work but We are witnesses over you when you enter into it, and there does not lie concealed from your Lord the weight of an atom in the earth or in the heaven, nor any thing less than that nor greater, but it is in a clear book.
rows.transliteration: wa mā takūnu fī sha-nin wa mā tatlū minhu min qur-ānin walā ta`malūna min `amalin illā kunnā `alaykum shuhūdan idh tufīḍūna fīh ۚ wa mā ya`zubu `an rabbika min mithqāli dharratin fil-arḍi walā fis samā-i walā aṣghara min dhālika walā akbara illā fī kitābin mubīn

rows.arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
rows.translation: Now surely the friends of Allah-- they shall have no fear nor shall they grieve.
rows.transliteration: alā inna awliyā-allāhi lā khawfun `alayhim walā hum yaḥzanūn

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ يَتَّقُونَ
rows.translation: Those who believe and guarded (against evil):
rows.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūn

rows.arabic: لَهُمُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَفِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ لَا تَبْدِيلَ لِكَلِمَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
rows.translation: They shall have good news in this world's life and in the hereafter; there is no changing the words of Allah; that is the mighty achievement.
rows.transliteration: lahumul bushrā fil ḥayātid dunyā wafil-ākhirah ۚ lā tabdīla likalimātillāh ۚ dhālika huwal fawzul `aẓīm

rows.arabic: وَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّ ٱلْعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًا ۚ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
rows.translation: And let not their speech grieve you; surely might is wholly Allah's; He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
rows.transliteration: walā yaḥzunka qawluhum ۘ innal `izzata lillāhi jamī`ā ۚ huwas samī`ul `alīm

rows.arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُرَكَآءَ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَإِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا يَخْرُصُونَ
rows.translation: Now, surely, whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth is Allah's; and they do not (really) follow any associates, who call on others besides Allah; they do not follow (anything) but conjectures, and they only lie.
rows.transliteration: alā inna lillāhi man fis samāwāti wa man fil-arḍ ۗ wa mā yattabi`ul ladhīna yad`ūna min dūnillāhi shurakā-a ۚ in yattabi`ūna illaẓ ẓanna wa in hum illā yakhruṣūn

rows.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ لِتَسْكُنُوا۟ فِيهِ وَٱلنَّهَارَ مُبْصِرًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَسْمَعُونَ
rows.translation: He it is Who made for you the night that you might rest in it, and the day giving light; most surely there are signs in it for a people who would hear.
rows.transliteration: huwal ladhī ja`ala lakumul layla litaskunū fīhi wan nahāra mubṣirā ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yasma`ūn

rows.arabic: قَالُوا۟ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدًا ۗ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ ۖ هُوَ ٱلْغَنِىُّ ۖ لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنْ عِندَكُم مِّن سُلْطَـٰنٍۭ بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَتَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: They say: Allah has taken a son (to Himself)! Glory be to Him: He is the Self-sufficient: His is what is in the heavens and what is in the earth; you have no authority for this; do you say against Allah what you do not know?
rows.transliteration: qālut-takhadhallāhu waladā ۗ subḥānah ۖ huwal ghaniyy ۖ lahu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۚ in `indakum min sulṭānin bihādhā ۚ ataqūlūna `alallāhi mā lā ta`lamūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفْتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْكَذِبَ لَا يُفْلِحُونَ
rows.translation: Say: Those who forge a lie against Allah shall not be successful.
rows.transliteration: qul innal ladhīna yaftarūna `alallāhil kadhiba lā yufliḥūn

rows.arabic: مَتَـٰعٌ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا ثُمَّ إِلَيْنَا مَرْجِعُهُمْ ثُمَّ نُذِيقُهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلشَّدِيدَ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْفُرُونَ
rows.translation: (It is only) a provision in this world, then to Us shall be their return; then We shall make them taste severe punishment because they disbelieved.
rows.transliteration: matā`un fid dunyā thumma ilaynā marji`uhum thumma nudhīquhumul `adhābash shadīda bimā kānū yakfurūn

rows.arabic: وَٱتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ نُوحٍ إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِن كَانَ كَبُرَ عَلَيْكُم مَّقَامِى وَتَذْكِيرِى بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ فَأَجْمِعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَكُمْ وَشُرَكَآءَكُمْ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُنْ أَمْرُكُمْ عَلَيْكُمْ غُمَّةً ثُمَّ ٱقْضُوٓا۟ إِلَىَّ وَلَا تُنظِرُونِ
rows.translation: And recite to them the story of Nuh when he said to his people: O my people! if my stay and my reminding (you) by the communications of Allah is hard on you-- yet on Allah do I rely-- then resolve upon your affair and (gather) your associates, then let not your affair remain dubious to you, then have it executed against me and give me no respite:
rows.transliteration: watlu `alayhim naba-a nūḥin idh qāla liqawmihi yāqawmi in kāna kabura `alaykum maqāmī watadhkīrī bi-āyātillāhi fa`alallāhi tawakkaltu fa-ajmi`ū amrakum washurakā-akum thumma lā yakun amrukum `alaykum ghummatan thummaq-ḍū ilayya walā tunẓirūn

rows.arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَمَا سَأَلْتُكُم مِّنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَأُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
rows.translation: But if you turn back, I did not ask for any reward from you; my reward is only with Allah, and I am commanded that I should be of those who submit.
rows.transliteration: fa-in tawallaytum famā sa-altukum min ajr ۖ in ajriya illā `alallāh ۖ wa-umirtu an akūna minal muslimīn

rows.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ وَأَغْرَقْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا ۖ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
rows.translation: But they rejected him, so We delivered him and those with him in the ark, and We made them rulers and drowned those who rejected Our communications; see then what was the end of the (people) warned.
rows.transliteration: fakadhhabūhu fanajjaynāhu wa man ma`ahu fil fulki waja`alnāhum khalā-ifa wa-aghraqnal ladhīna kadhhabū bi-āyātinā ۖ fanẓur kayfa kāna `āqibatul mundharīn

rows.arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ رُسُلًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِمْ فَجَآءُوهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَمَا كَانُوا۟ لِيُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِمَا كَذَّبُوا۟ بِهِۦ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَطْبَعُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُعْتَدِينَ
rows.translation: Then did We raise up after him apostles to their people, so they came to them with clear arguments, but they would not believe in what they had rejected before; thus it is that We set seals upon the hearts of those who exceed the limits.
rows.transliteration: thumma ba`athnā min ba`dihi rusulan ilā qawmihim fajā-ūhum bil bayyināti famā kānū liyu-minū bimā kadhhabū bihi min qabl ۚ kadhālika naṭba`u `alā qulūbil mu`tadīn

rows.arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِم مُّوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا مُّجْرِمِينَ
rows.translation: Then did We send up after them Musa and Haroun to Firon and his chiefs with Our signs, but they showed pride and they were a guilty people.
rows.transliteration: thumma ba`athnā min ba`dihim mūsā wahārūna ilā fir`awna wa mala-ihi bi-āyātinā fastakbarū wakānū qawman mujrimīn

rows.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ مِنْ عِندِنَا قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
rows.translation: So when the truth came to them from Us they said: This is most surely clear enchantment!
rows.transliteration: falammā jā-ahumul ḥaqqu min `indinā qālū inna hādhā lasiḥrun mubīn

rows.arabic: قَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَتَقُولُونَ لِلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَكُمْ ۖ أَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَا وَلَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلسَّـٰحِرُونَ
rows.translation: Musa said: Do you say (this) of the truth when it has come to you? Is it magic? And the magicians are not successful.
rows.transliteration: qāla mūsā ataqūlūna lilḥaqqi lammā jā-akum ۖ asiḥrun hādhā walā yufliḥus sāḥirūn

rows.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَجِئْتَنَا لِتَلْفِتَنَا عَمَّا وَجَدْنَا عَلَيْهِ ءَابَآءَنَا وَتَكُونَ لَكُمَا ٱلْكِبْرِيَآءُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا نَحْنُ لَكُمَا بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
rows.translation: They said: Have you come to us to turn us away from what we found our fathers upon, and (that) greatness in the land should be for you two? And we are not going to believe in you.
rows.transliteration: qālū aji-tanā litalfitanā `ammā wajadnā `alayhi ābā-anā watakūna lakumal kibriyā-u fil-arḍi wa mā naḥnu lakumā bimu-minīn

rows.arabic: وَقَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱئْتُونِى بِكُلِّ سَـٰحِرٍ عَلِيمٍ
rows.translation: And Firon said: Bring to me every skillful magician.
rows.transliteration: waqāla fir`awnu-tūnī bikulli sāḥirin `alīm

rows.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ
rows.translation: And when the magicians came, Musa said to them: Cast down what you have to cast.
rows.transliteration: falammā jā-as saḥaratu qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mulqūn

rows.arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَلْقَوْا۟ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ مَا جِئْتُم بِهِ ٱلسِّحْرُ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَيُبْطِلُهُۥٓ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُصْلِحُ عَمَلَ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
rows.translation: So when they cast down, Musa said to them: What you have brought is deception; surely Allah will make it naught; surely Allah does not make the work of mischief-makers to thrive.
rows.transliteration: falammā alqaw qāla mūsā mā ji-tum bihis siḥr ۖ innallāha sayubṭiluh ۖ innallāha lā yuṣliḥu `amalal-mufsidīn

rows.arabic: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْحَقَّ بِكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
rows.translation: And Allah will show the truth to be the truth by His words, though the guilty may be averse (to it).
rows.transliteration: wayuḥiqqullāhul ḥaqqa bikalimātihi walaw karihal mujrimūn

rows.arabic: فَمَآ ءَامَنَ لِمُوسَىٰٓ إِلَّا ذُرِّيَّةٌ مِّن قَوْمِهِۦ عَلَىٰ خَوْفٍ مِّن فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِمْ أَن يَفْتِنَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّ فِرْعَوْنَ لَعَالٍ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
rows.translation: But none believed in Musa except the offspring of his people, on account of the fear of Firon and their chiefs, lest he should persecute them; and most surely Firon was lofty in the land; and most surely he was of the extravagant.
rows.transliteration: famā āmana limūsā illā dhurriyyatun min qawmihi `alā khawfin min fir`awna wa mala-ihim an yaftinahum ۚ wa inna fir`awna la`ālin fil-arḍi wa innahu laminal musrifīn

rows.arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِن كُنتُمْ ءَامَنتُم بِٱللَّهِ فَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلُوٓا۟ إِن كُنتُم مُّسْلِمِينَ
rows.translation: And Musa said: O my people! if you believe in Allah, then rely on Him (alone) if you submit (to Allah).
rows.transliteration: waqāla mūsā yāqawmi in kuntum āmantum billāhi fa`alayhi tawakkalū in kuntum muslimīn

rows.arabic: فَقَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا فِتْنَةً لِّلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
rows.translation: So they said: On Allah we rely: O our Lord! make us not subject to the persecution of the unjust people:
rows.transliteration: faqālū `alallāhi tawakkalnā rabbanā lā taj`alnā fitnatan lilqawmiẓ ẓālimīn

rows.arabic: وَنَجِّنَا بِرَحْمَتِكَ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
rows.translation: And do Thou deliver us by Thy mercy from the unbelieving people.
rows.transliteration: wanajjinā biraḥmatika minal qawmil kāfirīn

rows.arabic: وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَأَخِيهِ أَن تَبَوَّءَا لِقَوْمِكُمَا بِمِصْرَ بُيُوتًا وَٱجْعَلُوا۟ بُيُوتَكُمْ قِبْلَةً وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
rows.translation: And We revealed to Musa and his brother, saying: Take for your people houses to abide in Egypt and make your houses places of worship and keep up prayer and give good news to the believers.
rows.transliteration: wa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā wa-akhīhi an tabawwa-ā liqawmikumā bimiṣra buyūtan waj`alū buyūtakum qiblatan wa-aqīmuṣ ṣalāh ۗ wabashhiril mu-minīn

rows.arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ ءَاتَيْتَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَأَهُۥ زِينَةً وَأَمْوَٰلًا فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا رَبَّنَا لِيُضِلُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِكَ ۖ رَبَّنَا ٱطْمِسْ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَٱشْدُدْ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ فَلَا يُؤْمِنُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
rows.translation: And Musa said: Our Lord! surely Thou hast given to Firon and his chiefs finery and riches in this world's life, to this end, our Lord, that they lead (people) astray from Thy way: Our Lord! destroy their riches and harden their hearts so that they believe not until they see the painful punishment.
rows.transliteration: waqāla mūsā rabbanā innaka ātayta fir`awna wa mala-ahu zīnatan wa-amwālan fil ḥayātid dunyā rabbanā liyuḍillū `an sabīlik ۖ rabbanaṭ-mis `alā amwālihim washdud `alā qulūbihim falā yu-minū ḥattā yarawul `adhābal-alīm

rows.arabic: قَالَ قَدْ أُجِيبَت دَّعْوَتُكُمَا فَٱسْتَقِيمَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعَآنِّ سَبِيلَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: He said: The prayer of you both has indeed been accepted, therefore continue in the right way and do not follow the path of those who do not know.
rows.transliteration: qāla qad ujībat da`watukumā fastaqīmā walā tattabi`ānni sabīlal ladhīna lā ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: وَجَـٰوَزْنَا بِبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلْبَحْرَ فَأَتْبَعَهُمْ فِرْعَوْنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ بَغْيًا وَعَدْوًا ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَدْرَكَهُ ٱلْغَرَقُ قَالَ ءَامَنتُ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِىٓ ءَامَنَتْ بِهِۦ بَنُوٓا۟ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
rows.translation: And We made the children of Israel to pass through the sea, then Firon and his hosts followed them for oppression and tyranny; until when drowning overtook him, he said: I believe that there is no god but He in Whom the children of Israel believe and I am of those who submit.
rows.transliteration: wajāwaznā bibanī isrā-iylal-baḥra fa-atba`ahum fir`awnu wajunūduhu baghyan wa`adwā ۖ ḥattā idhā adrakahul gharaqu qāla āmantu annahu lā ilāha illal ladhī āmanat bihi banū isrā-iyla wa-ana minal muslimīn

rows.arabic: ءَآلْـَٔـٰنَ وَقَدْ عَصَيْتَ قَبْلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
rows.translation: What! now! and indeed you disobeyed before and you were of the mischief-makers.
rows.transliteration: āl-āna waqad `aṣayta qablu wakunta minal mufsidīn

rows.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ نُنَجِّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُونَ لِمَنْ خَلْفَكَ ءَايَةً ۚ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا لَغَـٰفِلُونَ
rows.translation: But We will this day deliver you with your body that you may be a sign to those after you, and most surely the majority of the people are heedless to Our communications.
rows.transliteration: fal yawma nunajjīka bibadanika litakūna liman khalfaka āyah ۚ wa inna kathīran minan nāsi `an āyātinā laghāfilūn

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ بَوَّأْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مُبَوَّأَ صِدْقٍ وَرَزَقْنَـٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ فَمَا ٱخْتَلَفُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْعِلْمُ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقْضِى بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
rows.translation: And certainly We lodged the children of Israel in a goodly abode and We provided them with good things; but they did not disagree until the knowledge had come to them; surely your Lord will judge between them on the resurrection day concerning that in which they disagreed.
rows.transliteration: walaqad bawwa-nā banī isrā-iyla mubawwa-a ṣidqin warazaqnāhum minaṭ ṭayyibāti famakh-talafū ḥattā jā-ahumul `il-m ۚ inna rabbaka yaqḍī baynahum yawmal qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn

rows.arabic: فَإِن كُنتَ فِى شَكٍّ مِّمَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ فَسْـَٔلِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَقْرَءُونَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِن قَبْلِكَ ۚ لَقَدْ جَآءَكَ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُمْتَرِينَ
rows.translation: But if you are in doubt as to what We have revealed to you, ask those who read the Book before you; certainly the truth has come to you from your Lord, therefore you should not be of the disputers.
rows.transliteration: fa-in kunta fī shakkin mimmā anzalnā ilayka fas-alil ladhīna yaqra-ūnal kitāba min qablik ۚ laqad jā-akal ḥaqqu min rabbika falā takūnanna minal mumtarīn

rows.arabic: وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
rows.translation: And you should not be of those who reject the communications of Allah, (for) then you should be one of the losers.
rows.transliteration: walā takūnanna minal ladhīna kadhhabū bi-āyātillāhi fatakūna minal khāsirīn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّتْ عَلَيْهِمْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: Surely those against whom the word of your Lord has proved true will not believe,
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna ḥaqqat `alayhim kalimatu rabbika lā yu-minūn

rows.arabic: وَلَوْ جَآءَتْهُمْ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
rows.translation: Though every sign should come to them, until they witness the painful chastisement.
rows.transliteration: walaw jā-at hum kullu āyatin ḥattā yarawul `adhābal-alīm

rows.arabic: فَلَوْلَا كَانَتْ قَرْيَةٌ ءَامَنَتْ فَنَفَعَهَآ إِيمَـٰنُهَآ إِلَّا قَوْمَ يُونُسَ لَمَّآ ءَامَنُوا۟ كَشَفْنَا عَنْهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْخِزْىِ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَمَتَّعْنَـٰهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
rows.translation: And wherefore was there not a town which should believe so that their belief should have profited them but the people of Yunus? When they believed, We removed from them the chastisement of disgrace in this world's life and We gave them provision till a time.
rows.transliteration: falawlā kānat qaryatun āmanat fanafa`ahā-iymānuhā illā qawma yūnusa lammā āmanū kashafnā `anhum `adhābal khizyi fil ḥayātid dunyā wa matta`nāhum ilā ḥīn

rows.arabic: وَلَوْ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَـَٔامَنَ مَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ كُلُّهُمْ جَمِيعًا ۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُكْرِهُ ٱلنَّاسَ حَتَّىٰ يَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
rows.translation: And if your Lord had pleased, surely all those who are in the earth would have believed, all of them; will you then force men till they become believers?
rows.transliteration: walaw shā-a rabbuka la-āmana man fil-arḍi kulluhum jamī`ā ۚ afa-anta tukrihun nāsa ḥattā yakūnū mu-minīn

rows.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفْسٍ أَن تُؤْمِنَ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَيَجْعَلُ ٱلرِّجْسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
rows.translation: And it is not for a soul to believe except by Allah's permission; and He casts uncleanness on those who will not understand.
rows.transliteration: wa mā kāna linafsin an tu-mina illā bi-idhnillāh ۚ wayaj`alur rijsa `alal ladhīna lā ya`qilūn

rows.arabic: قُلِ ٱنظُرُوا۟ مَاذَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَمَا تُغْنِى ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتُ وَٱلنُّذُرُ عَن قَوْمٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: Say: Consider what is it that is in the heavens and the earth; and signs and warners do not avail a people who would not believe.
rows.transliteration: qulin-ẓurū mādhā fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ wa mā tughnil-āyātu wan nudhuru `an qawmin lā yu-minūn

rows.arabic: فَهَلْ يَنتَظِرُونَ إِلَّا مِثْلَ أَيَّامِ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوْا۟ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ قُلْ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓا۟ إِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُنتَظِرِينَ
rows.translation: What do they wait for then but the like of the days of those who passed away before them? Say: Wait then; surely I too am with you of those who wait.
rows.transliteration: fahal yantaẓirūna illā mithla ayyāmil ladhīna khalaw min qablihim ۚ qul fantaẓirū innī ma`akum minal muntaẓirīn

rows.arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّى رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ حَقًّا عَلَيْنَا نُنجِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
rows.translation: Then We deliver Our apostles and those who believe-- even so (now), it is binding on Us (that) We deliver the believers.
rows.transliteration: thumma nunajjī rusulanā wal ladhīna āmanū ۚ kadhālika ḥaqqan `alaynā nunjil mu-minīn

rows.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِن كُنتُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّن دِينِى فَلَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِينَ تَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَـٰكِنْ أَعْبُدُ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِى يَتَوَفَّىٰكُمْ ۖ وَأُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
rows.translation: Say: O people! if you are in doubt as to my religion, then (know that) I do not serve those whom you serve besides Allah but I do serve Allah, Who will cause you to die, and I am commanded that I should be of the believers.
rows.transliteration: qul yā-ayyuhan nāsu in kuntum fī shakkin min dīnī falā a`budul ladhīna ta`budūna min dūnillāhi walākin a`budullāhal ladhī yatawaffākum ۖ wa-umirtu an akūna minal mu-minīn

rows.arabic: وَأَنْ أَقِمْ وَجْهَكَ لِلدِّينِ حَنِيفًا وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
rows.translation: And that you should keep your course towards the religion uprightly; and you should not be of the polytheists.
rows.transliteration: wa-an aqim wajhaka lilddīni ḥanīfan walā takūnanna minal mushrikīn

rows.arabic: وَلَا تَدْعُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكَ وَلَا يَضُرُّكَ ۖ فَإِن فَعَلْتَ فَإِنَّكَ إِذًا مِّنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
rows.translation: And do not call besides Allah on that which can neither benefit you nor harm you, for if you do then surely you will in that case be of the unjust.
rows.transliteration: walā tad`u min dūnillāhi mā lā yanfa`uka walā yaḍurruk ۖ fa-in fa`alta fa-innaka idhan minaẓ ẓālimīn

rows.arabic: وَإِن يَمْسَسْكَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُۥٓ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ وَإِن يُرِدْكَ بِخَيْرٍ فَلَا رَآدَّ لِفَضْلِهِۦ ۚ يُصِيبُ بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
rows.translation: And if Allah should afflict you with harm, then there is none to remove it but He; and if He intends good to you there is none to repel His grace; He brings it to whom He pleases of His servants; and He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
rows.transliteration: wa in yamsaskallāhu biḍurrin falā kāshifa lahu illā huw ۖ wa in yuridka bikhayrin falā rādda lifaḍlih ۚ yuṣību bihi man yashā-u min `ibādih ۚ wahuwal ghafūrur raḥīm

rows.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدْ جَآءَكُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهْتَدِى لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيْكُم بِوَكِيلٍ
rows.translation: Say: O people! indeed there has come to you the truth from your Lord, therefore whoever goes aright, he goes aright only for the good of his own soul, and whoever goes astray, he goes astray only to the detriment of it, and I am not a custodian over you.
rows.transliteration: qul yā-ayyuhan nāsu qad jā-akumul ḥaqqu min rabbikum ۖ famanih-tadā fa-innamā yahtadī linafsih ۖ wa man ḍalla fa-innamā yaḍillu `alayhā ۖ wa mā ana `alaykum biwakīl

rows.arabic: وَٱتَّبِعْ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ وَٱصْبِرْ حَتَّىٰ يَحْكُمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلْحَـٰكِمِينَ
rows.translation: And follow what is revealed to you and be patient till Allah should give judgment, and He is the best of the judges.
rows.transliteration: wattabi` mā yūḥā ilayka waṣbir ḥattā yaḥkumallāh ۚ wahuwa khayrul ḥākimīn
